an7.63:1.1: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena anathapindikassa gahapatissa nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
an7.63:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena anathapindikassa gahapatissa nivesane manussa uccasadda mahasadda honti.
an7.63:1.3: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho anathapindikam gahapatim bhagava etadavoca:
an7.63:2.1: “Kim nu te, gahapati, nivesane manussa uccasadda mahasadda kevatta manne macchavilope”ti?
an7.63:2.3: Sa neva sassum adiyati, na sasuram adiyati, na samikam adiyati, bhagavantampi na sakkaroti na garum karoti na maneti na pujeti”ti.
an7.63:3.1: Atha kho bhagava sujatam gharasunham amantesi:
an7.63:3.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho sujata gharasunha bhagavato patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho sujatam gharasunham bhagava etadavoca:
an7.63:4.3: Vadhakasama, corisama, ayyasama, matasama, bhaginisama, sakhisama, dasisama.
an7.63:4.4: Ima kho, sujate, satta purisassa bhariyayo.
an7.63:4.6: “Na kho aham, bhante, imassa bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajanami.
an7.63:4.7: Sadhu me, bhante, bhagava tatha dhammam desetu yathaham imassa bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham janeyyan”ti.
an7.63:4.8: “Tena hi, sujate, sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
an7.63:4.9: “Evam, bhante”ti kho sujata gharasunha bhagavato paccassosi.
an7.63:14.1: Ima kho, sujate, satta purisassa bhariyayo.
an7.63:14.3: “Ajjatagge mam, bhante, bhagava dasisamam samikassa bhariyam dharetu”ti.
